location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to James Dow, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns deteriorating relations between the British and the Baghdad Government. Taylor writes that in light of the recent 'outrageous and unjustifiable' seizure of British property by the Baghdad Government, the Residency in Baghdad is suspending all communications between the people and the Government of Bussora [Basra]. Roger writes that he will be removing the public establishment flag to Mohammerah [Khorramshahr].
